S:log-item.D:comment: SOLR-4640: CachingDirectoryFactory can fail to close directories in some race conditions. SOLR-4637: Replication can sometimes wait until shutdown or core unload until removing some tmp directories. SOLR-4638: DefaultSolrCoreState#getIndexWriter(null) is a way to avoid creating the IndexWriter earlier than necessary, but it's not implemented quite right. SOLR-4597: fixes, improvements SOLR-4629: Stronger testing.
